plot: Melinda aims to help a trio of boys and their dog, all fifty-years-dead, pass into the light before the destruction of the inn they haunt dooms them to remain Earth-bound spirits.

Andrea and Melinda are contracted to auction furniture from a community inn before it is torn down. While cleaning the basement, Melinda finds the lost spirits of three boys and their dog that perished in an orphanage fire fifty years ago. Melinda tries to help the boys pass on before the inn is destroyed and they are forever locked as earth-bound spirits. Meanwhile, as she becomes a Wendy to these "lost boys" and their ageless Peter Pan-like leader, Melinda must also deal with Lew, Jim's visiting boyhood friend who has, in all aspects but physical, never grown past adolescence.—Abakusek/addition by statmanjeff
